TI: Response of hippocampal pacemaker-like neurons to low doses of ionizing radiation.
AB: Spontaneous discharges of hippocampal pacemaker-like neurons are induced by X- and gamma-rays doses lower than 0.8 cGy. The effect is direct and connected with the activation of an endogenous mechanism of unit activity generation.
TA: Int J Radiat Biol Relat Stud Phys Chem Med
JT: International journal of radiation biology and related studies in physics, chemistry, and medicine
SO: Int J Radiat Biol Relat Stud Phys Chem Med. 1986 Apr;49(4):597-600.
